DOC.brief_summary: This trial conduct Europe . The aim trial investigate effect liraglutide gallbladder empty overweight obese subject .
DOC.brief_title: A Trial Assess Effects Liraglutide Gallbladder Emptying Overweight Obese Subjects
DOC.criteria: Male female , age 1864 year ( inclusive ) time sign informed consent Body mass index ( BMI ) equal 27.0 kg/m^2 Stable body weight ( less 3 kg selfreported change previous 3 month ) Ultrasound assessment gallbladder volume acceptable quality screening , judge investigator Female pregnant , breastfeed intend become pregnant childbearing potential use adequate contraceptive method ( intrauterine device hormonal contraception ( oral contraceptive pill , implant , transdermal patch , vaginal ring longacting injection ) ) History gastrointestinal surgery medical procedure preclude gallbladder empty assessment ( appendectomy allow ) significant digestive disease per judgement investigator History pancreatitis ( acute chronic ) gallbladder disease ( incl . gallstone , gallbladder sludge , polyp ) Any disorder investigator 's opinion might jeopardise subject 's safety compliance protocol
